name: Dream Factory
description: Sitting in front of a screen or TV you might think that the process behind filming and producing a movie is a piece of cake. Try and play Dream Factory first. With this Filming Simulator you will ‘dive’ headfirst into the busy world of movie making. Our approach is to look at the industry in an ironic way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: AMD Athlon X2 7750 or Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6600GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 76 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse
